CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 21, 1959, page A18, reads: "Presidents With Speakers - Mrs. Sarah Lloyd, left, and Mrs. Adell Long talk with Dr. M. R. Hadley who spoke at the regional meeting of the Pennsylvania State Federation of Negro's Women's Clubs last Saturday. The one day convention was held in McKeesport. The Narcissus Club, Mrs. Lloyd president, and the Semper Fidelis Club, Mrs. Long, president, were hosts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, left to right, Sarah Lloyd, Dr. M. R. Hadley, and Adell Long, gathered for the Pennsylvania State Federation of Negro Women's Clubs held at the Bethlehem Baptist Church in McKeesport
